attributes.action: restrict immegration numbers to increase job opportunities for British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people are now out of work and are finding it very difficult to find work, caused through the economic decline. We should now be restricting numbers entering the UK to give British people greater opportunities in finding work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
